message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.CY, cs.SI 

This paper focuses on investigating problems users face when interacting with intelligent systems in everyday situations, which is a key concern in the field of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper uses sentiment analysis and topic modelling to analyze user reviews of four apps, which falls under the category of natural language processing (cs.CL) and information retrieval (cs.IR). Additionally, the paper discusses the importance of user control and feedback, which are relevant topics in cybersecurity (cs.CY) and social and information networks (cs.SI).
